page.title: 06TECHNOLOGY
page.content: Technological Equipment at Home.A class of infants and first and second year juniors decided to find out what pieces of technological equipment they had in their homes.The results were as follows:telephones 11,televisions 24, videos 8,computers 2,recordplayers 24. The survey shows that over half the children in the class have tetephones in their homes.Each home has a television and a record player.Some homes have more than one of these probably having an extra set in the child's bedroom!Eight families have video recorders at home.Video films can be hired from the nearby towns.Only two households have computers.However considering the low socio_economic area this is perhaps not so surprising.
